duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and enter new matter information into accounting software
Produce pre-bills, review, edit, and verify billing accuracy
Follow-up on past due invoices with attorneys and clients
Assist with accounts payable and special projects
Ensure strict confidentiality at all times

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, some college preferred. 2+ years of hands-on intake and/or billing experience in a law firm or professional service industry. Juris (or equivalent accounting software) experience, preferred. Demonstrated proficiency with MS Office.
